input: Pick the glass and place it on the kitchen table.
Grab the book and put it on the shelf.
Take the plate and place it on the table and grab a spoon.
Pick up the laptop and put it on the bed.
Take the pen and give it to John.
Open the fridge and grab the bottle.
Pick up the towel, fold it, and place it on the chair.
Turn on the lamp and inspect the book.
Wash the spoon and put it back in the drawer.
Take the key from the table and hide it under the mat.
